Hey man, thanks for the upload. Does this include the latest updates?
How do you replace the RCT3plus.exe with the cracked verison?

Hi thanks for the download but im unsure how to play i have installed the game and now have the rct3plus but am unsure where to put it. i have opened up all programs/atari/rct3/ and pasted it there but that does nothing. I also cant find a folder called insatll directory. im using windows xp on an acer travelmate 6592, if thats relevent. if you need clarification on what inve asked you just post. Thankyou

@Hudokid "Install directory" isn't an actual folder, it refers to the directory where you installed RollerCoaster Tycoon 3. The goal with the rctplus.exe is to replace the original one that came in with the install with the cracked one in this torrent. Just find rctplus.exe and replace it with the one in this torrent, since you're running XP, it should be in "C:\Program Files\Atari\RollerCoaster Tycoon 3". Go into that folder and you'll find rct3plus.exe. Not "All programs", it's in "Program Files". Program Files is a folder on your C drive containing all your installed programs.
Thankyou so much for the torrent and ballsofsatan(?) for the help.
